name: Ojama Delta Base
text: While this card is on the field and you control an "Ojama" monster, switch all monsters attack and defense. When this card is activated: draw 5 cards, reveal your hand, and discard any that do not have "Ojama" in their name. Once per turn, you can Special Summon up to 3 "Ojama" cards from your Deck or Extra Deck. During your opponent’s turn, if you have a monster in both extra monster zones, you can activate this effect: immediately after this effect resolves, destroy up to 3 cards in your opponent’s hand, randomly. While you control "Ojama Delta Base", both players cannot activate Field Spells.
